steps.title: The colors are up to you, but stick with solids so you don't overwhelm the look.
steps.content: The colors are up to you, but stick with solids so you don't overwhelm the look. Don't be afraid to play with preppy colors! A pop of color can balance your neutral pieces to make your whole look more interesting. For example, if you're wearing red chinos, style them with a blue shirt or a white shirt with a charcoal gray trench coat or jacket. [1] X Expert Source Nejla Renee Fashion Stylist & Image Consultant Expert Interview. 18 May 2020. Popular preppy colors include burgundy, emerald green, pink, aqua, yellow, and coral.

steps.title: Prints can take an outfit from minimalist or modern to preppy in an instant.
steps.content: Prints can take an outfit from minimalist or modern to preppy in an instant. Try to stick to a simple formula of 2 solid colors or neutrals with 1 patterned item like plaid or paisley. You might choose a patterned shirt, sweater, or dress, for instance. [2] X Expert Source Nejla Renee Fashion Stylist & Image Consultant Expert Interview. 18 May 2020. For example, wear a plaid shirt with cream-colored trousers or wear a blue gingham tunic with a khaki skirt. Paisley, tweed, and nautical prints are all staples in a preppy wardrobe. Try wearing a navy striped shirt tucked into fitted jeans and wear a navy quilted jacket. Wear polka dots for a fun, preppy look that's great for a casual summer outfit.

steps.title: Pair khaki with any preppy top or jacket since it works with anything!
steps.content: Pair khaki with any preppy top or jacket since it works with anything! Khaki is a preppy must-have—it's a stylish option for casual, everyday outfits, and you can wear it to dressy functions. Buy a pair of tailored khaki pants or a stylish knee-length khaki skirt. If you want to round out your summer wardrobe, pick up a pair of khaki shorts, too. To simply style your khakis, pair a skirt or trousers with a plain leather belt and a crisp fitted shirt or polo. Want to dress up your preppy khaki outfit? Throw on a fitted blazer and wear nice leather shoes or pumps.

steps.title: Preppy outfits are relatively simple in nature—they come down to a few classic items.
steps.content: Preppy outfits are relatively simple in nature—they come down to a few classic items. This makes it really easy to look preppy! Once you build a basic wardrobe, you can create dozens of outfits. Stock up on these essentials to get started: [3] X Expert Source Nejla Renee Fashion Stylist & Image Consultant Expert Interview. 18 May 2020. Tunics Tailored trousers or skirts Button-down shirts or blouses Polos or oxford shirts Navy suits or blazers Sweaters Trench coat

steps.title: Navy, white, and khaki are great colors for preppy clothes.
steps.content: Navy, white, and khaki are great colors for preppy clothes. They're really easy to pair with brighter colors or preppy prints. These colors also look great on everyone. For example, pick up a navy blazer and a white shirt. [4] X Research source Black can be a preppy color if you use it sparingly. Save it for formal looks like a fitted black blazer with a khaki skirt, crisp white shirt, and emerald green pumps or leather loafers.

steps.title: Go for a cabled or argyle sweater to create a cozy, winter look.
steps.content: Go for a cabled or argyle sweater to create a cozy, winter look. Preppy looks aren't just for the summer. For cold-weather preppy style, pop on a cashmere sweater in a solid color over a button-down shirt. To add interest, you could wear a cabled knit sweater or an argyle sweater that has a colorful diamond pattern. [5] X Research source Don't forget that a solid cardigan is also a timeless preppy piece. Throw it over your shoulder if it's just a little cool out, or toss on a sleeveless V-neck sweater.

steps.title: Stick to a simple conservative outfit that doesn't show a lot of skin.
steps.content: Stick to a simple conservative outfit that doesn't show a lot of skin. When you think of a preppy style, think simple, clean, and classic. If you want to wear a skirt, for instance, pick a knee-length skirt instead of a mini-skirt. Choose tops with sleeves or short sleeves to provide a little coverage. [6] X Research source For a casual look with coverage, pair a colorful tunic with khaki chinos, for instance.

steps.title: If you wear your hair short, comb it back and part it along the side.
steps.content: If you wear your hair short, comb it back and part it along the side. For a little volume, style it up into a pompadour. For longer hair, pull it back into a ponytail or a low bun at the nape of your neck. Remember that your hairstyle is just one more way to make your preppy look unique! [7] X Research source Headbands and bows are cute, preppy hair accessories that you can play around with. Style your hair with matte pomade or shiny gel to keep your perfectly coiffed hair in place all day.

steps.title: Pair your outfit with loafers, flats, or boat shoes.
steps.content: Pair your outfit with loafers, flats, or boat shoes. Preppy shoes should look functional, comfortable, and classic. Loafers, moccasins, and duck boots are great choices for men, while women could wear flats, boat shoes, duck boots, or nude heels. [8] X Research source Match your shoes to the occasion. If you're looking preppy at an evening event, wear nice loafers or kitten heels. If you're dressing for work, wear something comfortable like boat shoes or a pair of flats.

steps.title: Wear bowties or belts to complement your outfit.
steps.content: Wear bowties or belts to complement your outfit. If you're wearing a button-down shirt, consider wearing a fun bowtie or a bold striped tie to add interest. Belts are also a great preppy accessory—choose a plain leather belt to wear with your trousers, skirt, or jeans. [9] X Research source Break out your sunglasses for a fun accessory. Choose vintage styles like large circular sunglasses or aviators. Shop for a monogrammed belt buckle if you'd like a personalized preppy accessory.

steps.title: Choose pieces like pearls, simple cufflinks, or watches.
steps.content: Choose pieces like pearls, simple cufflinks, or watches. You don't want flashy, glamorous jewelry to distract from the tailored look you've put together. Stock your wardrobe with pearl earrings, necklaces, and bracelets, or pick up gold or nautical cufflinks if you frequently wear suits. A great watch is never out of place either! [10] X Research source

steps.title: The most popular patterns for girls include argyle and plaid.
steps.content: The most popular patterns for girls include argyle and plaid. If you are a girl you can wear plaid skirts and tops. You can also wear an argyle sweater vest. Also wearing a tweed jacket is very preppy with a tweed skirt. If you are a boy popular patterns are plaid, argyle, and stripes. Wearing a plaid shirt is an option you can also wear an argyle or striped sweater vest.
